title: Game Scoop Episode 605
description: Welcome back to Game Scoop!, IGN's weekly video game podcast. This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Justin Davis, Mark Medina, and maybe a special guest -- are discussing the WORST games of the year. Oh yeah, there's also this game called Cyberpunk to talk about. The song at the end of this episode is the acoustic version of Daemon's Christmas song, "1985."
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
